8080.description: Port for Scrutiny's web interface and API.
8080.label: WebUI HTTP port [e.g. 8080]

COLLECTOR_CRON_SCHEDULE.description: Crontab entry (env: COLLECTOR_CRON_SCHEDULE) MIN(0-59) HOUR(0-23) DOM(1-31) MOY(1-12) DAW(0-6). Default (midnight): "0 0 * * *" [must include quotation marks].
COLLECTOR_CRON_SCHEDULE.label: Stats Schedule [e.g. "0 0 * * *"]

Scrutiny.description:
WebUI for smartd S.M.A.R.T monitoring. Scrutiny is a Hard Drive Health Dashboard & Monitoring solution, merging manufacturer provided S.M.A.R.T metrics with real-world failure rates from Backblaze. Install requires 5 part crontab.

Warning: In order to access devices, this container runs with privileged capabilities.

Based on the official OCI image, available for amd64 and arm64 architecture.
Scrutiny.more_info:
Note:This image updates its stats once a day, you may see: 'No Devices Detected!' before the first collector cron schedule.
Command line stats refresh via: docker exec scrutiny scrutiny-collector-metrics run
For documentation see: Scrutiny GitHub
